entry.string: Maximum number of subtask levels to cascade
entry.translation: Mexeemoom noomber ooff soobtesk lefels tu cescede

entry.string: Show extra options in task list
entry.translation: Shoo ixtra oopshuns in tesk leest

entry.string: Task to return to after new submission
entry.translation: Tesk tu retoorn tu effter noo soobmeessiun

entry.string: Task to return to after edit submission
entry.translation: Tesk tu retoorn tu effter ideet soobmeessiun

entry.string: Task to return to after surfacing subtasks
entry.translation: Tesk tu retoorn tu effter soorffeceeng soobtesks

entry.string: Task to return to after migrating subtasks
entry.translation: Tesk tu retoorn tu effter meegreting soobtesks
